warningAdBlocker.message: It seems an Ad Blocker running. Please turn off all Ad Blocker to make Social Media Monitor work better.

notLoggedYet.message:
Note! If you have not logged in Facebook, Social Media Monitor is not working.
If you are already logged in please wait for a few moments...

consentAlert.message:
Welcome to Social Media Monitor! Why don't you sign the consent form?

This popup will not appear again!
